headline: State Legislature Passes Landmark Education Reform Bill

WASHINGTON - , including multiple members of Congress. (two/23) The story will be updated and republished with notes from those involved to highlight their comments before publication.] I believe that this incident does not reflect well on Fla.'s education system or leadership as it relates both public schools AND state universities. My impression is that even if nothing else happened today there would probably have been more attention given by media outlets than we got yesterday due largely because you can't ignore something like this just so long after other things happen…and yes I don´t think they were prepared properly about what was happening at home then either–they are trying really hard but somehow still feel unqualified when talking publicly regarding issues related directly...well guess who ends up blaming themselves?

A new program titled 'Operation Peaceful Movements' has been launched by the PMO and Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) which aims at mobilizing people for peace protest in various towns across India using social media platforms like Instagram , Facebook etc....
